inclusion.criterion: neuroendocrine tumors of unknown primary site
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: men and women of childbearing potential
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: prior chemotherapy with capecitabine or temozolomide
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: hypersensitivity to capecitabine, 5-FU, temozolomide or DTIC
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: serious medical or psychiatric illness preventing informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: tumor spread to central brain and spinal cord
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: prior malignancies in the last 5 years
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of anaplastic astrocytoma, but does not meet inclusion criteria for metastatic neuroendocrine tumor. Patient is also on high-dose steroids and has hypertension.
